com.captiveimagination.jgn
Interface MessageSender

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegisterServerMessageSender
public interface MessageSender

MessageSender should be implemented by applications utilizing Updater. The MessageSender is used to determine how many times a message should be sent per cycle and sendMessage() is called to send the message.

Author:
Matthew D. Hicks

Method Summary
 int getUpdatesPerCycle()
           
 boolean isEnabled()
           
 void sendMessage()
          This method is called updatesPerCycle numbers of times per cycle.
